data.text: @ICMRDELHI @MoHFW_INDIA @DeptHealthRes @PIB_India @mygovindia @COVIDNewsByMIB so you lower the testing to lower the cases detected. this will be a catastrophe in the coming days, especially with the newer variant expected to be more dangerous than omicron, but even if otherwise, decreasing testing is not a good sign

@ICMRDELHI @MoHFW_INDIA @DeptHealthRes @PIB_India @mygovindia @COVIDNewsByMIB @covid19indiaorg @MantralayaRoom @PMOIndia @AUThackeray 
8.73 lakh tests ? Please let us not regret later . We should see between 6k to 9k cases with a possible high of 11k cases . Recovery is at 98.69% and Positivity is at 0.65% for March and 5.54% overall . https://t.co/EQma1ohjSo

@ICMRDELHI @MoHFW_INDIA @DeptHealthRes @PIB_India @mygovindia @COVIDNewsByMIB रोजाना पांच करोड़ टेस्ट कर पूरे महीने में पूरे भारत की टेस्टिंग कर इस बेहद खतरनाक महामारी से सबको बचाना चाहिए लाइन लगाकर करो जांच चाहे बीमारी मिले या नही  जांच जरूर करे

@ICMRDELHI @MoHFW_INDIA @DeptHealthRes @PIB_India @mygovindia @COVIDNewsByMIB app Bost makes it easy and safe to communicate with peole around. Download for free at Apple https://t.co/uChWynVbJG & Google https://t.co/Nvi0yitq3f https://t.co/yxDL92yZoU
